document.title: Compiling EiffelEnvision Projects
document.paragraph:
Compiling projects, often refered to as vxconProjectBuilds 0 Building in Visual Studio .NET is the process of compiling the Eiffel source files, each containing an urlEiffel class declaration, and creating an assembly. The assembly generated from a build can be executed as a stand-alone application or used from another application.
